name: SUPER Dino Contagion - Boss Edition
description:
A little game we made for the #GGJ2018 (Theme: Transmission).

Sadly we didn't make it on time... but we keep working on it post-jam to finish it

In Super Dino Contagion (Boss Edition) your work is to spread the flu all over the office to reach the boss, so you can go home!

The mechanics are very simple, just put the dinos in place... and start contagion!

Our Team:

Joel Partida
